rings.name: ADOPT
rings.description: We feel strongly that the teams should be adopting these items. We use them when appropriate on our teams and projects.

rings.name: TRIAL
rings.description: Worth pursuing. Teams should try this technology on a project that can handle the risk.

rings.name: ASSESS
rings.description: Worth exploring with the goal of understanding how it will affect your team.

rings.name: HOLD
rings.description: Proceed with caution. We recommend choosing and exploring other options when possible.

entries.title: Backstage
entries.description: Backstage as a developer portal enables both discovery of existing capbilities and allow teams the autonomy to own the description and contents of their services.

entries.title: Hugo
entries.description: We have found that Hugo's markdown based syntax and flexible themeing to be easy and quick for standing up and maintaining a static site.
